segments.text: I'm so hungry ! Can you buy me a burrito ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't have any money to buy you a burrito .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please ? I haven't eaten anything all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , I only have money to buy myself a burrito .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm so hungry , I could eat a whole cow !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you're so hungry , why don't you ask someone else for money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I get paid on Friday , I'll pay you back then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess on Friday , then you can eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you just go home and eat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want to go all the way home just to eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess you're out of luck .
segments.speaker: S2
